title: (x) Beijing 2008 Olympics logo - custom designed {Andrew J Sipe}
content:
Hi all,

Can you help me Identify this font please !

By the way, did someone know where I can find the logo of the Beijing 2008 olympic in out line !!!

Thank you very much !

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Img214070082.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130220084538/http:/typophile.com/files/Img214070082.jpg) | 39.15 KB |
author: Marc C

comments.content: Marc, I think this is a custom application created specifically for this logo. There might be some nice alternative brush stroke based fonts out there though.

Here's a link to the logo in EPS format: [http://www.brandsoftheworld.com/brands/0008/6642/Beijing\_2008.eps](http://web.archive.org/web/20130220084538/http:/www.brandsoftheworld.com/brands/0008/6642/Beijing_2008.eps "http://www.brandsoftheworld.com/brands/0008/6642/Beijing\_2008.eps")

check veer: [http://www.veer.com/search/results.aspx?keyword=brush-script&producttype...](http://web.archive.org/web/20130220084538/http:/www.veer.com/search/results.aspx?keyword=brush-script&producttype=TYP&pricemodel=RM%2CRF "http://www.veer.com/search/results.aspx?keyword=brush-script&producttype=TYP&pricemodel=RM%2CRF")

they have some nice brush-scripts, like Whisk Broom or Gizmo

Thank you very much Asvetic and Stephen I really appreciated.

I did make a search befored for the logo, but my english is not really good.

Thank's again !!!!!

Marc C
